tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We initially visited Dr. Meera Kumari for a second opinion after my previous doctor suggested an invasive surgery in the first trimester to prevent miscarriage. As we weren't convinced about this recommendation, we sought Dr. Kumari’s advice.

Dr. Kumari provided a thorough explanation and a thoughtful alternative, suggesting that we only consider the surgery if it became absolutely necessary. She assured us it might not be needed, and she was right in the end. We chose her as our primary gynecologist for the remainder of my pregnancy.

Throughout my pregnancy, Dr. Kumari offered exceptional medical care, friendly guidance, and unwavering support, making a potentially stressful experience into a manageable one. She always insisted for Normal delivery and prepared me thoroughly for it, which is a rare find these days.

Finally, she delivered my healthy baby through a Normal procedure! 

In closing, I am incredibly grateful for her exceptional skill and heartfelt care, and I highly recommend her to anyone seeking the best in gynaecological and obstetric care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Pregnancy is very special. And choosing the right doctor plays an important role. I was referred to Meera ma’am by my sister and consulting her is one of the best decisions I’ve made in my pregnancy journey.
She’s very specific and will give you the information and guidance required on monthly basis. From 5th month she guided regarding exercises and always motivated me for vaginal delivery. She is extremely calm and has a lot of patience .
my delivery journey was smooth and successfully delivered (Vaginal delivery ) baby girl. I would definitely recommend you to choose her for your pregnancy journey.

Thank you so much Meera ma’am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Would like to give a big thanks to Dr Meera  for helping us in our difficult pregnancy journey,  we are blessed with a baby girl  and  can't thank enough for the special, exceptional, and excellent care & guidance Dr Meera provided in this difficult and high-risk pregnancy. You are God's gift for your patients, and i am blessed that you are my doc! I have great confidence in you and your treatment  both in terms of medical and councelling, 
“Thank you so much for all your guidance in this lifesaving journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Meera Kumari at Gynaika Health Center throughout my pregnancy journey. Her expertise and guidance helped me achieve a normal delivery, which I'm forever grateful for. Dr. Kumari's personalized care and attention to detail made me feel confident and comfortable throughout the process. 

Her warm and caring demeanor put me at ease during every consultation. I highly recommend Dr. Kumari to any expectant mother seeking a supportive and skilled gynecologist. She is truly a blessing! My pregnancy journey was made smooth and stress-free thanks to her.

 I can't thank her enough for her exceptional care. Dr. Kumari is a true gem in her field. I'm so glad I chose her as my gynecologist. Five stars aren't enough; I'd give her ten stars if I could!\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: laproscopic Hysterectomy surgery My wife had large fibriods of 15cm and low iron.Took my wife to Dr. Meera madam at Gynaika clinic, from initial visit itself my wife had gained the confidence starting treatment with infusion of iron injections  & various tests prior to the surgery & Dr. Meera madam had conducted the Laproscopic hysterectomy at Cloud nine hospital kanakpura road very successfully & recovery post surgery is remarkable.I wish to reccomend Dr. meera  kumari madam of anyone required consultaion for gynocology & laproscopic surgeries.Thanks  Ravikumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Meera kumari is very friendly & answered all my queries from day 1. She helped & supported me throughout my pregnancy journey, be it recommending food to eat , exercises to be done , how not to take stress etc...
Was able to recover faster post c-section with her guidance.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My wife Rashmi’s pregnancy journey with the consultation of Dr.Meera Kumari was absolutely smooth and helpful.Doctor is well expertise.
With lot of patience,treated my wife for healthy delivery.
Would definitely highly recommend.

Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife visited Dr. Meera Kumari for her maternity care, and we couldn't be happier with the experience. She provided unwavering support and guidance throughout the pregnancy, ensuring both my wife and our baby were healthy and well-cared for. She was particularly instrumental in helping us achieve a normal delivery, offering expert advice and encouragement every step of the way. Her calm and reassuring presence during labor made a significant difference, and we are incredibly grateful for her dedication to a positive birth experience. 

We are  grateful for Dr. Meera Kumari's exceptional care and highly recommend her to anyone in need of a gynaecologist. She is a remarkable doctor who genuinely cares about her patients, and her expertise and compassion make her a standout in her field. Thank you, Dr.Meera Kumari, for your outstanding service and dedication.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a major laparoscopic surgery for my 13cm large uterus fibroids and the overall pre and post surgery , everything was very smooth transition for me,  in a less than a month I was able to complete the procedure and got recovered and able to travel back to US. 

With my experience with multiple visits with 3-4 different Dr’s in US and India , I’m only happy with Dr. Meera where I received the best treatment instead of confusion options and surgeries which I received from other Dr’s for an year but still no better results.

Thank you once again Dr . Meera Kumari

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Meera Kumari is the perfect choice for maternity care. I first visited her for pre-delivery counseling, and she supported me throughout my entire pregnancy journey. She is patient and listens to her patients carefully, offering only necessary medications and scans. My experience included an emergency C-section, and she was with me from the beginning, providing excellent mental support during that time. Her knowledge and expertise are commendable. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking the best maternity care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Labor and Delivery,
review: When we are planning for our 2nd baby, We are in search of a doctor near by Kanakapura road and we visited could nine for the same. We have seen Meera Kumari profile and we booked an appointment with her.  From the 1st meet with Meera Kumari we are very satisfied with the treatment and we decided to continue with her. She explains everything with patience and in simple way that you can clear all the doubts in one go. She provided some tips and things to do which are very help full to me during pregnancy. Even she is available through phone and she responses to our doubts, which is very full as we can avoid to visit hospital for small doubts. Coming to my delivery, I got my labor pains bit early than expected due date. We have visited hospital for the same and visited the emergency doctor to confirm whether it's a false contraction or real one as it too early for delivery. For our surprise its a real contraction and we are very tensed. Doctor visited us and done the regular check up and suggested us that it's better to delay the labour for 2 more weeks as its too early and it might be difficult to baby after delivery. She tried her best to slow down the contractions and delay the delivery. But my contractions were same and I got delivered on next day after waiting for 18 hours. We are very satisfied and happy the way Meera Kumari acts to the situations and try to apply all the possible ways to treat it.  Finally we are very happy with her care and support she provided on my entire pregnancy journey.  Thank you Doctor for all the support and care you provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Dr. Meera Kumari is really the perfect doctor must anybody consult for maternity care. I personally consulted her from my early pregnancy and till the delivery of my child, it was absolutely fantastic. The way she listens to any query and the solutions and suggestions given by her is really appreciating. And also the need to mention the cleanliness and availability of all modern equipments essential are present at the hospital. 
I personally recommend the needy ones to meet/consult with Dr. Meera Kumari for perfect maternity care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have taken consultation during my pregnancy with Dr Meera. I must say she is quite qualified, well, behaved and professional . Throughout my pregnancy she listened to query patiently and answered each and every query in detail. At the time of delivery she was very supportive. In my case it was emergency as well so she handled it very well. She used to give accurate information in timely manner and kept us informed about everything with no last minute surprise. Overall I had a very good experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Child Birth Education,Post Pregnancy Classes,
review: I am unable to resist myself from writing this.Dr. Meera kumari is a well learned gynac who counselled me very well through out my pregnancy journey. In every step she used to fill in assurance and knowledge without bias. I am glad that I chose Dr. Meera kumari. I delivered a boy baby through NVD with the doctors patience and administration. Really happy to share this experience. She took a right stand at right time and facilitated a normal delivery. I highly recommend Dr. Meera Kumari....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am writing to express my profound gratitude for the exceptional support and guidance you provided throughout my maternity journey. Your role as my obstetrician and gynecologist has been pivotal, and I am immensely grateful for the additional layers of support you offered as a friend, elder sister, and, at times, a stern but caring maternal figure.
From the outset of my pregnancy, you exhibited a high level of professionalism and compassion. Upon reviewing my test results, you promptly advised me to embark on a regimen of regular walks and a controlled diet, given my pre-pregnancy weight. Your clear and concise explanations regarding the necessity of these measures demonstrated your commitment to my well-being. Your consistent follow-ups during each visit ensured that I adhered to the prescribed diet and exercise routine.
As a first-time expectant mother, I was naturally filled with anxieties and numerous inquiries. I deeply appreciate your patience in addressing my concerns and providing thorough explanations that helped alleviate my worries. Your accessibility during unconventional hours further exemplified your dedication to your patients.
Upon reaching the 39th week, when the decision was made to opt for a c-section, I placed unwavering trust in your expertise. The procedure unfolded seamlessly, and your reassuring presence played a significant role in making the experience positive. I vividly recall feeling genuinely content and at ease during the operation, a sentiment attributed to my complete faith in your capabilities.
Post-c-section, your guidance on postoperative precautions and dietary measures facilitated a remarkably smooth recovery. I am grateful for the meticulous care you extended throughout this phase, which contributed to making my maternity journey a relatively effortless endeavor.
Dr. Meera, thank you sincerely for your unwavering support, genuine care, and expertise that transformed what could have been a challenging period into a truly manageable and positive maternity experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Meera is really great doctor and she is great human being too! She listen patiently and explains things nicely! She is very caring doctor and her attention to details is really awsome! We have been blessed that we met Dr. Meera and she has been great from pre to post Pregnancy! 
Dr. Meera is highly recommended !! Thanks you Dr. Meera!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Meera provided exceptional care throughout my pregnancy journey. Her guidance over the nine months was not only thorough but also tailored towards achieving a normal delivery and ensuring a healthy pregnancy. Dr. Meera's personalised approach, combined with her friendliness and extensive knowledge, made the entire experience positive and reassuring. She goes beyond being a healthcare provider, offering invaluable support and making us feel confident and cared . We highly recommend Dr. Meera to anyone seeking a gynaecologist who is not only knowledgeable but also genuinely invested in the well-being of both mother and child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to take this opportunity and thank Doctor Meera, who assisted us with our Pregnancy journey from Inception till the end.

 

While we were searching for an experienced gynecologist and obstetrician during our second pregnancy, We came across Dr Meera, who has a commendable Patience and Empathy.

 

At a given point she ensures that she understands, listens to her patients fully and soothes them with proper resolution and care. As her patients we felt extremely satisfied experiencing that she doesnt Shun off her patients and devotes ample time for each of them.

 

She treats all her Patients with a smile, and abides by the "Less Is more" policy ensuring only utmost necessary medication and tests are prescribed.

 

Doctor Meera ensures that she, guides and asks her patient to act accordingly per the appropriate scenario and ensures no Havocs are created at the Nth Moment.

 

During the time of our delivery we had couple of complications and risks engulfed, but Doctor Meera Pacified and Soothed us and still chose Normal Delivery, amidst the challenges only because it was in the best favoir of Mother and child.

 

We Truly believe each word of Dr Meera stands for itself, Thanks a Lot Doctor.

 

M - Modest

E - Empathetic

E - Expereinced

R - Realistic

A - Amicable

 

We wish Dr Meera all the very best and would defiently recomend her, *** ** *** **** ** *** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr Meera from the time I conceived and during my entire journey of pregnancy and delivery she was very patient and treated all kinds of problems and symptoms with great efficiency and extreme care. She always helped me to keep myself relaxed and peaceful throughout my pregnancy. I would strongly recommend Dr Meera.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Based on Google review we visited Dr Meera Kumari during my 5th month pregnancy since then till today we are really happy about our decision. Dr Meera Kumari is very friendly and approachable. Listens to all our queries patiently and resolves it, instills confidence in us to be prepared for delivery with positive mindset. During my labour Dr Meera has been very supportive and caring. I would definitely recommend Dr Meera to all the pregnant women’s without any second thought.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited first for my pregnancy confirmation test since that day till day of delivery u have been very calm and friendly with me .explaining me the pregnancy scenario to helping me in last push u were absolutely wonderful 👍 you explain everything so deeply ❤️ with your help and guidance my whole pregnancy journey went very peacefuly and happily.thank you dr meera .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Dr. Meera during my pregnancy and from day 1 she was nothing but positive and thoroughly helpful. In fact we decided not to change our house cause we wanted to stay close to the doctor so that we can continue our pregnancy journey with her. *** *** ***** ***** ** *** *********** ***** *** ********** ********** ********** In fact I am a bit hypochondriac and would ask her many questions and she would patiently listen to us and assure me that everything will be fine. During the last week of pregnancy, Dr was out of station and I had my fingers crossed that I shouldn't go into labor when she is not in town. Finally, on the day of labor I couldn't believe I pulled off a normal delivery. I was induced at 10 AM and went into active labor at around 5, and at 5:45 I delivered a beautiful baby boy safely. 100% recommend her to anyone who resides in South Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Iam glad to share the beautiful journey of my. it’s my first pregnancy and I’m blessed with a baby boy 

throughout my pregnancy i was anxious and helpless about normal delivery as i was consulting other gynaecologists.
as miracles happens in life even at the end, i was in 36th week thats when i met Dr.Meera kumari 

i was almost 36th week 2days from morning i had very mild stomach cramps and dizziness, i was little scared because in scan of 35th week the fluid level was less, it was around 9cm and my old gynaecologists said me to be careful and consult her immediately if something abnormal for my bad that whole day doctor was unavailable,
i couldn’t reach her through phone or in hospital 

That’s when my cousin searched for gynaecologist through google and went to clinic gynaika health centre @8:30pm
feom that day no more looking back i  got positive vibes and good guidance from doctor meera kumari as she helped me to increase the fluid level, if not i should have went for c section at my 37th week

She helped me to be positive and active at 38th week 5th day successfully i had normal delivery at Cloudnine kanakapura road all thanks to Dr.Meera kumari

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We thank Dr. Meera for her care and support before, during and after the procedure. She is a compassionate listener, clarifies all doubts and instills confidence in the patient. Her focus and attention to detail are exemplary. Highly recommended her for all gynaecology related treatments including laparoscopic surgeries.  A big salute and thanks for her support!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I met Dr Meera Kumari at Cloudnine Kanakapura Road for excessive bleeding issue. In the first consultation itself, I felt very comfortable with her. She structurally explained everything and the possible courses of treatments. After the scan, she did a hysteroscopy first post which she knew I had cancer and will require hysterectomy. The way she managed the communication was commendable. She answered all my questions about hysterectomy patiently and performed the surgery on the date of my choice. The post op care was also very comfortable. I would any day recommend Dr Meera Kumari for all your gynec needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is so passionate and very much listening to the patient's problems. Does a detailed diagnosis and complete analysis. Very much skilled and knows many local languages which also helps. She is very much organised and helps patient to follow the same. A soulful and satisfying experience on our recent surgery. Thanks to the Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We got to know DR Meera mam from a friend. We were conceived with mo-di twins and she carefully explained us the details and complications involved. She also gave us thorough guidance on how to proceed with the tests and scans. She referred us to fetal specialist for our ultra sound scans which helped us find out any minor complications involved. Her patience and advice made the whole process very smooth for us. We also got C-Section procedure done at cloud nine hospital where she works. Our twins are now close to a month old and all 3 of us are doing great. I would highly recommend Dr. Meera mam for anything related to pregnancy. She treats her patients with care and concern and you would feel very safe throughout the pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
A BIG THANK YOU to Dr. Meera Mam .. because of her support we are blessed with baby girl. She visited directly to hospital from vacation …though she was tired travelling from miles away … 

During consultation, She had been very patience and gave us approachable feeling for our all doubts… she listens and give detailed plan in case if we are planning for family … totally it was pleasant experience…. 

And we randomly checked in Google and went for consultation but we got “Gem” (Meera Mam)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were searching for nearby Gynecologist in Uttarahalli for pregnancy related consultation *** ***** *** ***** ** *********** ********
We felt homely with Doctor & Main thing we liked is discriptive discussion. Doctor used to listen about all the issues,  concerns patiently and used to provide the solution. And, Dr. Meera is very responsive on even message. We used to take advise while in interim for any emergencies we felt.

Thank you very much Dr. Meera for your kind support & suggestions!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** * **** **** * **** *********** Before meeting with Dr. Meera, I have consulted with few other gyne who are just professional with their patients however Dr Meera is out of the world I would say, she not only listen everyone very patiently n calmly and give personal touch to all..i am a mother of two daughters n way she handled by both deliveries, are just superb..in spite of so many complications she managed so well and give her o/s support all the time..Usually I have seen so many cases where patients wants normal delivery but doctors threaten them with so many issues n complications n patients has to agree for C sec but Dr Meera only prefer to do normal deliveries n tries her best till the end. I would recommend everyone to consult this doctor and get best advice.

tags: None
review: I had a baby boy 2 months back. If it was not doctor Meera I do not think it would have been possible for me to cherish motherhood. From first visit she was more like a friend, a guide and an elder sister.  It was all her support and guidance throughout that helped us to go through this journey. She was always available on each call (trust me even during late night hours). She is confident in her treatment and very very positive approach towards everything. Thanks so so much doctor really. It's only bcz of you that I have my cute little baby around me. She really is wonderful and extremely wonderful doctor. She stood by me on the delivery date each moment and comforted me and assured that things will be fine. Really thanks a million times to doctor Meera. It is beyond words to express our gratitude and love to her.

tags: None
review: Dr. Meera Kumari is one such doctor who has very soft tone, kind hearted, down to earth person, detail oriented, calm and has a great approach towards her patients. In Recent Generation , it’s really had find a natural process of maternity birth. My wife and me was blessed with a baby boy and many thanks goes to Meera. I know C-Section is a really painfull!!! but i dont have other choices too. She followed her protocols strictly and updated conditions to a normal person like me in a laymens term. Sometimes things wont be normal, we need to switch for other alternatives, may be that decision was good for us. Thank you Meera Mam for helping us to go through in this Journey.  Appreciate your great service!!! Stay Happy and Blessed forever :-)
